com.SoftWoehr.JaXWT
Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.SoftWoehr.JaXWT.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController
extends java.lang.Object

A generic top-level application controller which can be used to stand "outside and above" a toplevel frame so that (for instance) an application can launch and manage multiple frames.

Version:
$Id: ApplicationController.java,v 1.1.1.1 2001/08/21 02:41:31 jwoehr Exp $
Author:
jax
